thread.title: John Stamos reportedly took date rape drug
thread.title_full: John Stamos reportedly took date rape drug

author:
Compiled by Tony Hicks

thicks@bayareanewsgroup.com
title: John Stamos reportedly took date rape drug
text:
John Stamos reportedly took date rape drug Compiled by Tony Hicks Posted: 10/08/2015 11:58:19 AM PDT Updated: 10/08/2015 12:06:55 PM PDT Prosecutors say John Stamos was under the influence of GHB -- also known as the date rape drug -- when he was arrested on suspicion of DUI in June, according to TMZ. 
Police pulled the "Grandfathered" actor over in Beverly Hill, after spotted him reportedly driving erratically. According to TMZ, authorities said Stamos was so messed up, they had to take him to the hospital, where they found GHB in his blood. 
Sources close to Stamos told the website the "Full House" star took the drug to "lean out body mass" while preparing for a role. Apparently some bodybuilders use it to build muscle mass and as a sleep aid. 
TMZ reports official charges will soon be filed. 
After his arrest, Stamos did 30 days in a live-in treatment facility. John Stamos attends the at 2015 PaleyFest Fall TV Previews at The Paley Center for Media on Tuesday, Sept. 15, 2015, in Beverly Hills, Calif. (Photo by Paul A. Hebert/Invision/AP) 
Tony Hicks writes celebrity commentary for the Bay Area News Group. Contact him at Facebook.com/BayAreaNewsGroup.TonyHicks or Twitter.com/tonyhicks67 Advertisement
